metadata.bio:
Hyukoh (Korean: 혁오), stylized as hyukoh is a four-member South Korean indie band formed in May, 2014. The band consists of Oh Hyuk (오혁) as leader and main vocalist, Im Hyun Je (임현제) as guitarist, Im Dong Gun (임동건) as bass, and Lee In Woo (이인우) as drummer.

The band became widely known in South Korea after participating in the 2015 Infinite Challenge Summer Music Festival in the popular Korean variety program Infinite Challenge.
